TABLE.NAME: local_analytics
TABLE.COMMENT: This table saves information about an instance of analytics

FIELD.NAME: usedimensions
FIELD.COMMENT: Use custom dimensions rather than custom variables.

FIELD.NAME: imagetrack
FIELD.COMMENT: Enable Image Tracking for Moodle for browsers with JavaScript disabled

FIELD.NAME: masqueradehandling
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether to track users who are masquerading as other users or are using a modified role.

FIELD.NAME: cleanurl
FIELD.COMMENT: Generate clean URL for in advanced tracking

FIELD.NAME: siteurl
FIELD.COMMENT: Analytics URL without http(s) or a trailing slash (for Google Analytics types leave empty)

FIELD.NAME: dimensions
FIELD.COMMENT: Serialized Dimensions settings used for Analytic
